/usr/local/cuda-10.1/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler -fopenmp -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/hw.dir/lab5.cu.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/otb_window.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a  -lpthread -lm -ldl -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
